Sockary: A subscription service that sends you a new pair of socks every month. The service can personalize the socks to your preferences, such as color, pattern, and material.
SockMorph: A mobile app that allows you to scan your socks and then morphs them into different designs and patterns.
SockMate: A social networking platform for sock enthusiasts to connect, share their collections, and discover new sock designs.
SockCycle: A recycling program for old socks that turns them into new, eco-friendly materials for other products.
SockGenius: An AI-powered tool that helps you find the perfect sock for your needs, based on your foot shape, size, and activity level.
